column4: i have setup a ubuntu gutsy mirror for my organisation, the mirror works fine on the installed hosts, but while i try to install a new host using netboot it fails with 404 while trying to download some files
well i dont want everyone of them hitting some mirror and choking my internet badwidth when all are going to get the same stuff
hmm. they are working on a ubuntu update server. that would be neat. just like wsus for windows.
it also works with new installs using apt-get or synaptic
